dish_description: The dish consists of two types of sandwiches. The first is an onion sandwich with mayonnaise, onion slices, and chives. The second is a radish sandwich with butter, radish slices, and parsley.

cooking_steps.description: Use a cutter or a glass to cut the bread into rounds, and trim the edges with a knife if necessary. Save the bread trimmings for making breadcrumbs.
Spread a generous amount of mayonnaise on two round bread slices.
Place thin slices of onion on one of the mayonnaise-covered bread slices. Season with a bit of salt.
Cover with the other slice of bread, pressing down to glue the sandwich together.
Spread a little mayonnaise on the outside of the sandwich and dip the edges in chopped chives.
For the radish sandwich, spread sweet unsalted butter on two slices of bread.
Thinly slice radishes and place them on one of the buttered bread slices. Add a bit of salt.
Cover with the other slice of bread, press down to seal, trim the edges to make it square, spread butter on the outside, and dip the edges in chopped parsley.
